name: openmanager-basic-ml
description: Basic ML Function - 기본 머신러닝 처리 전문 Function

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy basic-ml --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 512MB --timeout 120s --region asia-northeast3
scripts.deploy:health: gcloud functions deploy basic-ml-health --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 128MB --timeout 10s --region asia-northeast3
scripts.logs: gcloud functions logs read basic-ml --region asia-northeast3
